meanings.definition: To cover (a road or surface) with blacktop.
meanings.sent1: The workers were blacktopping the road to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The city crew will be blacktopping the street next week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the road go to therapy? It was feeling a bit rough, so it needed some blacktopping!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter blacktopped the room, filling it with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sun blacktopped the pavement, making it hot to the touch.

meanings.definition: The act of applying blacktop to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The blacktopping of the driveway was completed in just a few hours.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in blacktopping for parking lots.
meanings.sent3: Why did the blacktop go to school? To get a degree in blacktopping!
meanings.sent4: His words were like blacktopping, smoothing over any rough edges in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The blacktopping of the playground made it safer for the children to play on.
